docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., May 16--The Special Committee of Seventeen on Colonialism endorsed today its subcommittee's recommendation that the General Assembly call for independence "immediately" for Northern Rhodesia, a British protectorate in Africa.
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., May 16--The Special Committee of Seventeen on Colonialism endorsed today its subcommittee's recommendation that the General Assembly call for independence "immediately" for Northern Rhodesia, a British protectorate in Africa.
docs.abstract: UN com backs subcom rept urging immediate independence, rejects US rept urging more moderate action
